common_problems.solution: 1.PERFORM PAGE FOR STAFF 2.INSTRUCT PAX TO CONTACT AIRLINE CS NUMBER 3.INSTRUCT PAX NEEDS RETURN NEXT DEPARTING FLIGHT WHEN STAFF WILL BE AVAILABLE

1.PERFORM PAGE FOR STAFF 2.INSTRUCT PAX TO CONTACT AIRLINE CS LINE 3.INSTRUCT PAX NEEDS RETURN NEXT DEPARTING FLIGHT WHEN STAFF WILL BE AVAILABLE

common_problems.description: LUGGAGE WAS SUPPOSED TO BE TRANSFERED TO CONNECTING AA FLIGHT WHILE IN NASHVILLE, BUT DIDN'T MAKE IT TO FINAL DESTINATION'
common_problems.solution: 1.CHECK LOST AND FOUND ENTRIES - IF WE HAVE IT, TAKE IT TO AA BSO 2.INSTRUCT PAX TO CONTACT AA BSO OR CONTOUR CS LINE

common_problems.description: PAX SAY NO STAFF AT TICKET COUNTER FOR CHECKIN.
common_problems.solution: INSTRUCT PAX NEED TO WAIT EXACTLY 2 HOURS PRIOR TO DEPARTURE FOR STAFF TO ARRIVE AT COUNTER.

common_problems.description: PAX LIKE TO EAT AT RESTAURANTS BEFORE PROCEEDING TO BAGGAGE CLAIM AND ARE NOW MISSING LUGGAGE
common_problems.solution: 1.PERFORM PAGE FOR STAFF 2.INSTRUCT PAX TO CONTACT AIRLINE CS NUMBER 3.INSTRUCT PAX NEEDS TO RETURN NEXT DEPARTING FLIGHT WHEN STAFF WILL BE AVAILABLE

common_problems.description: PAX IS LATE AND TICKET COUNTER IS CLOSED
common_problems.solution: 1.PERFORM PAGE FOR STAFF TO MEET PAX AT TICKET COUNTER ONCE FLIGHT HAS DEPARTED
